name: pelican-panel
description: Panel is a lightweight self-hosted dashboard designed to group links, services, and widgets into a single portal. Itâ€™s ideal for server admins and homelab setups.
features: Link aggregation: Centralize access to all your services and applications through single, organized dashboard interface
Service widgets: Display real-time information from integrated services with customizable widgets showing status and metrics
Custom categories: Organize links and services into logical groups or categories for easier navigation and management
Lightweight design: Minimal resource usage makes it ideal for running on low-power devices or alongside other services
Responsive layout: Mobile-optimized interface adapts to any screen size for access from desktops, tablets, or smartphones
Icon support: Add custom icons or use built-in icon libraries to visually identify services at a glance
Search functionality: Quickly find services or links using integrated search without scrolling through categories
Theme customization: Personalize appearance with custom themes, colors, and layouts to match your preferences
Quick access: Bookmark-style interface provides instant access to frequently used services and tools
